CustomField.formula:
TEXT( Status) & " " & IMAGE( CASE( Status, "Active", "/img/samples/flag_green.gif", "Inactive", "/img/samples/flag_red.gif", "Junked", "/img/samples/flag_red.gif", "Sold", "/img/samples/flag_red.gif", "Traded In", "/img/samples/flag_red.gif", "", "/s.gif", "/img/samples/flag_green.gif"), "Status Flag")
/*
TEXT( Status) & " " & IMAGE( CASE( Status, "Active", "/img/samples/flag_green.gif", "Inactive", "/img/samples/flag_red.gif", "/s.gif"), "Status Flag")
*/
CustomField.label: Status
